name: Mad Monkey Waterfront
description:
You simply can't beat our location – we're directly on the vibrant Cairns Esplanade, with the stunning Cairns Lagoon just across the street! Pop down for a refreshing dip or spend the afternoon sunbathing anytime you fancy. We're also just a stone's throw away from the bustling Night Markets, perfect for grabbing a bite or a unique souvenir. 

Welcome to Mad Monkey Waterfront, where unbeatable location meets a true "home away from home" vibe in the heart of Cairns! As a proud part of the Mad Monkey Backpackers Group, our smaller, intimate property makes it incredibly easy to meet people, build lasting friendships, and truly become part of our extended Mad Monkey Family as you explore the gateway to the Great Barrier Reef. Our cozy common room is the heart of our social scene, perfect for unwinding after a day out: challenge new friends to board games, join a Nintendo Switch tournament, or settle in for a film night on Netflix. Our fully equipped modern kitchen is always ready for you to cook up a meal, truly making you feel at home.

Here's what you'll enjoy with every stay:
- Ultrafast WiFi
- Fully Equipped Kitchen
- Fully Air-Conditioned Rooms with Ensuites
- Spacious Rooms with Power Point & Bed Light at Each Bed
- Free Events & Nightly Entertainment (including pub crawls to top backpacker bars!)

You'll enjoy a comfortable stay in our spacious and clean rooms, all featuring air-conditioning to keep you cool in the tropical climate. Choose from Mixed Dorms Ensuite, Female Dorms Ensuite, or Private Double Rooms. All our dorms come with a private en-suite bathroom, high-quality mattresses, pillows, and linen. Plus, every bunk bed is equipped with a personal USB port and power socket to keep your devices charged. Private rooms include personal towels; dorm guests can easily hire one from reception if needed. Stay connected with ultra-fast Free Wi-Fi throughout the property, ensuring you won't miss a beat.

Important Info for Your Stay:
- Reception is open 8 am - 8 pm. If you plan to check in after 8pm, please inform us in advance, as our night manager will assist you.
- Check-out is before 10 am / Check-in is after 2 pm.
- We are a strictly 18+ property. While all adults are welcome, dorm rooms are recommended for guests aged 18 to 35.
- A valid physical passport is required for check-in. Photocopies will not be accepted.
- Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival. Please ensure there are sufficient funds to avoid cancellation.
- Group Bookings: Bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions, and we cannot guarantee placing all members of a group booking in the same room.
- No E-Bike batteries are allowed on the premises.

We look forward to welcoming you to the Mad Monkey Family so you can experience Cairns in style!

houseRules.notes:
Reception hours are from 8AM - 9PM. Please note: Contact reception before 8.30PM to organise a late check in. We would highly recommend to download the GOKI app before check in and to complete the pre check in link which is emailed to you upon booking. 

Check out before 10am and check in after 2pm
NOTE: Travellers only so a valid passport is needed upon check in.

We are a strictly 18+ property.
Recommended ages for dorm rooms is 18 to 35. We would advise booking a private room (where available) if outside of this age range for your own comfort.

- Your credit card details have been collected to secure your reservation only and you will be required to pay all accommodation charges upon check-in. If you are arriving outside of reception hours, your card will be charged prior to your arrival.
- We do not accept guests under the age of 18 years old.
- Prices are quoted in AUD and are subject to change daily. 
- Valid credit card and a valid passport are required upon check in.
- If you want to cancel or modify your reservation you must contact HostelWorld.
- The following payment methods are accepted; cash, credit or debit cards (Visa and MasterCard only). We do not accept American Express. All credit or debit cards incur a 1% payment fee. 
- The guest will be responsible for any loss or damage caused at the hostel by guests or visitors of guests. 
- $20 fee will be charged for late check out.
- When booking multiple beds in a shared dorm, we cannot guarantee to put people on the same booking in the same room, however we will do our best.
- Guests may not consume or store food and drinks in their rooms. Alcohol may not be consumed in any room at any time. Any alcohol or food found in the rooms will be removed.
- Smoking is only permitted within the designated smoking areas. 
- Zero drug tolerance policy

Property and Cancellation Policies :
- Cancellation of bookings within 24 hours of reservation will be charged 100% cancellation fee for the first nights stay for the number of beds booked.
- If customer fails to show up for the booking and hasn't given notice of cancellation, reservation will be marked as no show and you will be charged a 100% cancellation fee for the first nights stay for the number of beds booked.

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR’S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled.
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
